page.title: 10CHURCH FARM (PART 2)
page.content:
Mr. Racey owns Church Farm. He keeps cattle for market and also works a number of fields. He keeps chickens for eggs. He has several tractors. The tractors cost over Â£17,OOO each. He says they always seem to break down when there's alot of work or when it is raining. Then he has to go out and mend them himself. During the harvest the men work shifts day and night to get the work done. The combine harvester never stops except to be refuelled. He says it's busy all the year round and he has to try to fit his holidays into the farm schedule. This means that he cannot always take his holidays during school holidays.
By Tina and Sandra.
